ygData.subject: Murissa Sandwhisper (spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She is aligned with the Dervish Cutthroats. Kill enough of them and she won t like you.  I found this out the hard way also:-) Galtin of E ci
ygData.messageBody:
> Who the hell is this Murissa Sandwhisperer person? I was jaunting back to
> Freeport after killing some crocs the other day and assumed she was a vendor
> (like in E. Commons, where they are consistently not in the inns but rather
> in front of them or on top of them....still haven't figured that out yet)
> and she screamed something at me just before she quadruple whacked me for
> 127hp per slap.

She is aligned with the Dervish Cutthroats. Kill enough of them and she won't like you. I
found this out the hard way also:-)

Galtin of E'ci
